main_business: IT Asset Management and E-Waste Recycling
description: DataIT is a woman-owned business specializing in sustainable IT asset management and responsible disposal solutions. They provide a one-stop shop for Data Sanitization, Commercial Relocation, and E-Waste Removal to reduce logistical challenges and simplify operations. Their services ensure compliance, maximize value, and minimize environmental impact.
summary:
DataIT is a woman-owned IT asset management and e-waste recycling company with over 40 years of experience. They offer comprehensive services including data center decommissioning, data sanitization, commercial relocation, e-waste removal, and IT procurement. The company serves businesses nationwide with a focus on security, compliance, and environmental sustainability.

DataIT operates with a large team of 650+ employees and owns 284+ vehicles, having shipped over 374,000 parcels safely. They hold key certifications including R2v3, ISO 9001, ISO 14001, and ISO 45001, ensuring high standards for data security, quality management, and environmental responsibility. Their leadership includes Moe Popal as President and Mike Meshbesher as Director of Sales.

The company has successfully completed major projects for clients like Bed, Bath, and Beyond, UFC, and Cedars-Sinai hospitals, demonstrating their capability to handle large-scale data center decommissioning and e-waste disposal projects efficiently. DataIT emphasizes data security, regulatory compliance, and eco-friendly practices in all their services.
